item.title: EPISODE 24- Will Somebody Listen? Podcast
item.author: velvetjesus@live.com
item.description:
World Vision's 30 Hour Famine fights world hunger.
Ditch the morning coffee, just soap up.
TJ sings.
Scotty Goes to Space.
Dead man travels unnoticed on a train.
He died alone. He was found 13 months later.
Dead goats aren't much fun.
Puppy fed to a snake. Is it worse than killing a human child?

item.itunes:subtitle: EPISODE 24- Will Somebody Listen? Podcast

item.title: EPISODE 20 - Will Somebody Listen? Podcast
item.author: velvetjesus@live.com
item.description: Controvertial issues abound in this episode of Will Somebody Listen? We talk about the abortion debate and invite a pro-choice expert to come on a future show for an interview. What is right vs. wrong? Who has the right to decide? And much much more on this episode of Will Somebody Listen?

item.itunes:author: VelvetJesus
item.itunes:subtitle: EPISODE3 - Will Somebody Listen?
item.itunes:summary: Happy thanksgiving, Superman Returns the videogame review, our first edition of whose more insane?, Rock paper Scissors rematch! and TJ talks about racism. Plus, we talked to Paul (the Voice) Stanton.
item.itunes:keywords: Will Somebody Listen, Jesus, Church, news, Bible, Religion, Entertainment, Discussion, Fun, faith

item.title: EPISODE2 - Will Somebody Listen?
item.author: velvetjesus@live.com
item.description:
Dog's Vs religion, Bush gets voodoo curse, strange children's names, panda dung paper (its all the rage!), and the first ever audio podcast game of rock, paper, scissors!(that we know of) All this and more on this weeks Will Somebody Listen?
Please be forgiving of the first 15 minutes or so we were having technical difficulties
